snippet.title: Not For Broadcast | Official Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The award-winning propaganda simulator, Not For Broadcast, is coming to PlayStation (4, 5) and Xbox (One, X|S) on March 23rd!

Nominated for the IGF Seumas Mcnally Grand Prize and with 400,000 copies sold worldwide, Not For Broadcast lets players dive into a world of scathing satire, political tension and surreal screwball comedy in this one-of-a-kind game of live news management.

The game's first DLC, “Live & Spooky”, will also be available to pick up on consoles from launch!

More details on this release coming soon.

Join our Discord community:
https://discord.gg/notforbroadcast
